page.title: 20NANT POWER STATION & CREDITS
page.content: The school children visited the station as part of this project.One of their parents works there and showed us around. It was very interesting. We had to drive a half of a mile down into the hill by range rover. The water from Loch Nant and the surrounding hill streams is used to make hydro-electricity and then it flows down into Loch Awe below to be used again in the normal water cycle. There is plenty of water in this area and the environment is not disturbed too much even by the power station which is hidden inside the hill. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Katrina, Dougie, Lorne, David, Liam, Dominic and Arran and Mrs.Gillespie, their teacher were helped by, Miss J.MacGregor, Mrs.M.Angus, Mr.G.Francey, Mr.P.Spencer, and Mr.T.Gillespie in writing these pages.
